Featuring your favorite Pokémon in a peaceful nap, this calming design brings warmth and tranquility to your new tab. Quickly access your favorite websites with popular shortcuts, and make the tab your own by adding custom links. Stay organized with the built-in calendar and clock, and search the web effortlessly with your default search engine.

🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Instantly access your favorite websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with links you love.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of time and dates effortlessly.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search the web easily with your default search engine.
